text: Ibrahim Yakubu Lame (10 February 1953 â€“ 25 May 2019) was a Nigerian educator and politician. He served in the Senate from 1992 to 1993. He was made Minister of Police Affairs by President Umaru Musa Yar'Adua in 2008, serving until 2010. He was born in Bauchi State. Lame died on 26 May 2019 in Abuja, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Nigerian academics Category:Nigerian politicians
title: Ibrahim Lame
